scripts.setup: cd ./client && yarn install && cd .. && yarn install
scripts.build-prod: cd ./client && yarn run build && cp ./build ../dist/ -r && cd .. && cp ./src/ ./dist/ -r
scripts.prep-tmp: cd ./client && cp ./public/ ../dist/client/ -r && cp ./src/ ../dist/client/ -r && cp ./package.json ../dist/client && cd .. && cp ./src/ ./dist/ -r && cp ./package.json ./dist/ && cp ./website.config.js ./dist/
